channel.title: Ubuntu - Setting up JavaEE + MySQL + Tomcat problems
channel.description:
I have installed JavaEE SDK 6 with glassfish, installed MySQL and have downloaded the latest tomcat
however eclipse wont compile as it cant locate the javaEE lib files, which causes me a problem has anyone got experience with this or that could forward me a link?

item.title: Ubuntu - Setting up JavaEE + MySQL + Tomcat problems
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:3, topic:371603”]It will compile standard JavaSE projects, however when i create a JavaEE it cannot find the correct libraries. javax.servlet etc etc, i have tried to redefine JAVA_HOME and JRE_HOME however they just reset and do not work every time i close terminal.[/quote]The solution: Use IntelliJ IDEA
The Real Solution: No clue really.

PS: Try Apache Wicket, it is pro library

Read full topic
item.source: Ubuntu - Setting up JavaEE + MySQL + Tomcat problems
